metadata.description: The Event Hub authorization rule Id for Azure Diagnostics. The authorization rule needs to be at Event Hub namespace level. e.g. /subscriptions/{subscription Id}/resourceGroups/{resource group}/providers/Microsoft.EventHub/namespaces/{Event Hub namespace}/authorizationrules/{authorization rule}
Specify the name of the Event Hub
Enable or disable the execution of the policy
Whether to enable logs stream to the Event Hub - True or False
